reviewText: Every good kids love it
This set of DVDs is a nice progression thru the Bible for kids.
This was a Christmas gift for grandchildren. Happily received..Will be used during family devotion the parents said.
This for a grand child Christmas gift
Great stories

As always a wonderful product, shipping time, and all around great service provided by Amazon Prime. This DVD was just what the doctor ordered for my kids. I even found myself watching it soon after they started the disk, as it has great animation, sound, and of course subject matter. I highly recommend this for all ages, and denominations. They are all kid friendly stories, even with tough subject matter. 5 stars all the way!

Very well-done! It kept the attention of our 6 and 7-year-old grandchildren as well as the attention of us grandparents. The kids asked a lot of questions, and watched the videos several times while they were visiting.
great  thank you
GREAT DEAL - these are Nest Family Entertainment videos and cost $20 each story - really great price for 10 stories!
My four yr old daughter loves watching these!
I liked that these stories were true to scripture.  I am using them to share Jesus and God with my grandchildren.
Great version of biblical stories
Love the stories. My kids learn a lot:)
really helps our daughter remeber her Bible stories
This was a much welcomed gift. That everyone who views it, loves these stories. I'll definitely get more DVD's like this.
Series is ok. A lot of the stories are similar.  Would be nice to have other stories from the Bible within the series.
was new and worked well

I grew up with these videos on VCS so its so nice to have them on DVD for the kids!
The music is timeless and very well written, and the voice acting is always top notch. These are classics to me.
Bought for my Sunday School class. Yay!
We enjoyed the bible CD it was very understanding to my grandkids they Love it thank you.
